html: Tonight on The Big Picture with @OKnox: @SenCoryGardner says the US should consider expanding pressure against North Korea. Listen at 6pmET on the SiriusXM apphttp://app.siriusxm.us/potuspolitics pic.twitter.com/TvtGVY8DZ0
Decreasing pressure without concrete steps toward denuclearization by Kim Jong Un’s regime is a step in the wrong direction.
text: Decreasing pressure without concrete steps toward denuclearization by Kim Jong Un’s regime is a step in the wrong direction.

html: Maximum pressure means that we must utilize every tool at our disposal in equal measure—economic sanctions, diplomatic pressure, and robust military posture—to achieve our goal of complete, verifiable, irreversible denuclearization of North Korea.
text: Maximum pressure means that we must utilize every tool at our disposal in equal measure—economic sanctions, diplomatic pressure, and robust military posture—to achieve our goal of complete, verifiable, irreversible denuclearization of North Korea.

html: The reason why these exercises are necessary is because of North Korea’s historically hostile behavior and repeated violations of international law.
text: The reason why these exercises are necessary is because of North Korea’s historically hostile behavior and repeated violations of international law.

html: I oppose any steps toward normalization without denuclearization of the North Korean regime—the United States should not sacrifice joint military readiness with our allies to appease Kim Jong Un.https://www.nbcnews.com/news/military/u-s-end-large-scale-military-drills-south-korea-n978111 …

Passed the Senate 92-8
 
Passed the House 363-62
 
Heads to the President's desk to become law

html: Russia is officially responsible for a chemical weapons attack against a NATO member state on its own soil — a brazen violation of sovereignty of our closest ally. It requires a serious American response.

text: Three months ago, I introduced legislation that would direct the State Department to consider adding Russia to its list of state sponsors of terrorism, alongside its close allies Iran and Syria. The moral case for such a designation is sound.

text:
Statement just out from @SenCoryGardner calls for enforcing sanctions against Russia, determining if Russia is a state sponsor of terror, adds: "Nothing should change as of today – Putin’s Russia is not a friend to the United States."

#copoliticspic.twitter.com/qD5wdHST3u

html: The only ‘reset’ we can have with Russia is when it completely reverses course and begins to act in accordance with civilized norms and international law. Nothing should change as of today – Putin’s Russia is not a friend to the United States.
text: The only ‘reset’ we can have with Russia is when it completely reverses course and begins to act in accordance with civilized norms and international law. Nothing should change as of today – Putin’s Russia is not a friend to the United States.

html: I encourage the Administration to avoid the mistakes of past Administrations in normalizing relations with Russia at zero cost to Putin and his regime.
text: I encourage the Administration to avoid the mistakes of past Administrations in normalizing relations with Russia at zero cost to Putin and his regime.

html: Additionally, I will continue to support maximum economic sanctions on Russia, including the full implementation of the Countering America’s Adversaries Through Sanctions Act (CAATSA) that passed the Senate by a vote of 98-2.
text: Additionally, I will continue to support maximum economic sanctions on Russia, including the full implementation of the Countering America’s Adversaries Through Sanctions Act (CAATSA) that passed the Senate by a vote of 98-2.

html: I believe Russia is a state sponsor of terror and I’ve introduced legislation that would mandate the State Department to determine whether Russia merits this designation, along with their allies Iran and Syria that are already designated.
text: I believe Russia is a state sponsor of terror and I’ve introduced legislation that would mandate the State Department to determine whether Russia merits this designation, along with their allies Iran and Syria that are already designated.

html: Whether it be chemical attacks on our allied soil, the invasion of Ukraine, propping up the murderer Assad in Syria, or meddling in our elections through cyber-attacks, Vladimir Putin’s Russia remains an adversary to the United States.
text: Whether it be chemical attacks on our allied soil, the invasion of Ukraine, propping up the murderer Assad in Syria, or meddling in our elections through cyber-attacks, Vladimir Putin’s Russia remains an adversary to the United States.

html: Today I joined 11 of my colleagues in sending a letter calling on the Administration to halt current policies leading to the forced separation of minor children from their parents, who are illegally entering the US, & to allow Congress to fix the issue through legislation.
text: Today I joined 11 of my colleagues in sending a letter calling on the Administration to halt current policies leading to the forced separation of minor children from their parents, who are illegally entering the US, & to allow Congress to fix the issue through legislation.

html: I was one of only two Republican Senators who voted for every single immigration reform measure that the Senate voted on earlier this year, and it is time we find a solution to the problems at the border.
text: I was one of only two Republican Senators who voted for every single immigration reform measure that the Senate voted on earlier this year, and it is time we find a solution to the problems at the border.

html: Our immigration system is broken & the separation of children at our southern border shows just how critical it is that Congress pass immigration reform immediately. Children should not be penalized for the actions of their parents, & that’s exactly what is happening right now.
text: Our immigration system is broken & the separation of children at our southern border shows just how critical it is that Congress pass immigration reform immediately. Children should not be penalized for the actions of their parents, & that’s exactly what is happening right now.
